item.title: Episódio 126: John Roa - PyCon Colombia
item.description: Olá pessoal e sejam bem-vindos à mais um episódio do Castálio Podcast! Our guest for today’s episode is a passionate self taught team lead and software developer. Cyclist that loves speed. Director of Engineering at LendingFront and PyCon Colombia chief organizer. Our guest today is John Roa and we are going to be talking about PyCon Colombia which is going to happen in Medellin, Colombia through February 9, 10 and 11 - 2018.
